content.question: Congress has exerted the greats influence on the operation of a federal agency by doing which of the following?

choices.label: Requiring the agency to participate in interagency task forces
Dismissing an agency head who disagrees with congressional priorities
Reviewing the annual budget appropriations for the agency
Passing “sunset” legislation that terminates programs after a certain period
Asking the Supreme Court for advisory opinions on agency regulations

content.answer: Reviewing the annual budget appropriations for the agency
